title: Chase/Jacklitsch & Griffith/Chase Old Mill Double Namers for sale
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Chase/Jacklitsch & Griffith/Chase Old Mill Double Namers for sale
posts.post_content:
Both of these have just a sliver of the name above, but are still pretty cool cards.  The Griffith is hard to price.  The Old Mill back is really tough to find.  Mine is the only one I've seen come up for sale in the last 3 years.  The SGC and PSA pop reports combine for 8 known graded copies.

Shoot me any questions via PM or email ( [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url] )

Thanks for looking!

Griffith - Chase Old Mill $250

Chase-Jacklitsch P350 $125
Bump for a large price cut
